Source.Name: perl-sub-uplevel
Source.Summary: Sub::Uplevel - apparently run a function in a higher stack frame
Source.Description: Like Tcl's uplevel() function, but not quite so dangerous. The idea is just to fool caller(). All the really naughty bits of Tcl's uplevel() are avoided.
